description: Classes related to hierarchical language organization.

files.name: ll_Delegate.js
files.description: Creates a fake class that delegates all non existing method calls to another one

files.name: ll_ProxyConstructor.js
files.description: Delegated anonymous class intended to be used as a constructor used via Function#call

files.name: ll_ApplyProxyConstructor.js
files.description: Delegated anonymous class intended to be used as a constructor used via Function#apply
